title: Conservation of momentum - separation with time

content.question: A small block of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is held in place inside a larger, <math alttext="U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi></math>-shaped block of mass <math alttext="3 m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mi>m</mi></math>, as shown in the figure. Initially, the centers of mass of the two blocks are located at the same position, and a spring attached to the larger block is compressed a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> from its relaxed length by the smaller block. At time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, the two blocks are released from rest. At time <math alttext="t sub 1, end sub, is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>, the spring is at its relaxed length, the centers of mass of the two blocks are a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> apart, and the small block is moving to the right with a velocity <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> just as it loses contact with the spring. If there are no external forces exerted on the blocks-spring system, what is the distance of separation of the two centers of mass at a later time <math alttext="t is greater than t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>></mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="4 v times, open parenthesis, t minus t sub 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="D plus 4 v times, open parenthesis, t minus t sub 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="D plus two thirds v times, open parenthesis, t minus t sub 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="D plus four thirds v times, open parenthesis, t minus t sub 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="D plus four thirds v times, open parenthesis, t minus t sub 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
